dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Halt, intruder! What business do you have in these cursed lands?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek passage through these lands. I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: No one passes through the Veil without facing the consequences. Turn back now!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave peacefully. No need for violence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You show cowardice. Weakness like yours will not be tolerated.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will retreat. I do not wish to provoke further.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you should. Leave and never return. You are not worth the effort.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I stand my ground. If you seek conflict, you shall have it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it! Your defiance only seals your fate. Face the wrath of the Spectral Warriors!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be threatened. Prepare for a fight!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Brave words from a fool. Let's see if your actions can match your arrogance.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm ready for whatever you throw at me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then face the true terror of the Veil of Eternal Shadow! Feel the chill of death's embrace!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I reconsider. Perhaps we can find a common ground.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: There is no common ground with the likes of you. Prepare for oblivion!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come seeking answers and a way to end the darkness that plagues these lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Answers are for fools and dreamers. You will find only despair here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Despair or not, I will not be deterred. The darkness will end.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You are a fool to challenge the inevitable. Embrace your fate, fool!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see reason in your words. Show me the way to end this darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Reason? There is no reason in this world. Your naivety will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to vanquish the darkness and bring light back to these lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Light? In the Veil of Eternal Shadow? Your words betray your ignorance, fool!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Ignorant or not, I will cleanse this realm of the darkness that plagues it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from a blind wanderer. Face the wrath of the undead and perish!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no undead. Let our steel clash and see who prevails.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well. Your bravery will be your downfall. Prepare for everlasting darkness!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps there is wisdom in your words. Can we not find a peaceful resolution?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom is wasted on the weak. Embrace your fate and submit to the darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My ignorance may cloud my judgment, but my resolve remains unshaken.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Resolve without wisdom is mere folly. Prepare to face the consequences of your ignorance!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: A fool I may be, but I will not back down. Let destiny decide our clash.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Destiny has already sealed your fate. Embrace the darkness that awaits you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps I can learn from your wisdom. Guide me to the path of light.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: There is no light for you here. Only darkness and despair. Prepare for your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not be dissuaded by empty threats. The darkness will be banished.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish bravado will lead only to your demise. Face the shadows and embrace oblivion!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My resolve is unbreakable. Let us settle this with steel and sorcery.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stubborn fool. Your resolve will crumble before the might of the Spectral Warriors!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Is there no room for negotiation? Must it come to bloodshed?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bloodshed is the only language the undead understand. Prepare for the end, fool.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am the light that will pierce the darkness, the hope that will shine through.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hope? In these lands of eternal shadow? Your optimism is amusing, if not pitiful.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Optimism may be rare here, but it is what gives strength to the weak and weary.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength born of naivety is the weakest of all. Prepare to face the harsh reality.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Even the weak can find strength when faced with adversity. Let our strengths be tested.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your strength will crumble like dust in the wind. The darkness will consume you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps your reality is not the only truth. Can we not find a way to coexist?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? Inconceivable! You have sealed your own fate. Embrace the shadows!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The light within me will guide me through even the darkest of times. Let us find a way to peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace is a fleeting dream in these lands of eternal night. Your light will flicker and fade.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: A flicker can ignite a blaze. Let our meeting be the spark that banishes the darkness.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your blaze will be extinguished before it can even begin. Prepare for the end, fool.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Wisdom lies in finding peace amidst chaos. Let us seek a resolution that benefits us both.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: There is no benefit for you here. Only eternal darkness and despair. Embrace your end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The shadows may be deep, but the light shines brighter in contrast. Let us find a way to coexist in harmony.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Harmony? In a realm of eternal shadow? Your ignorance knows no bounds.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Ignorance or not, harmony is possible even in the darkest of places. Let us strive for understanding.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding? There is only suffering and darkness for one such as you. Embrace your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: In understanding lies the path to overcoming differences. Let us seek a way forward in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Differences cannot be overcome in this realm of eternal night. Prepare for your inevitable end.
